data.title: Arena
data.text:
This 46,000 square-foot facility can seat 10,000 individuals and is a great venue for a variety of events including concerts, rodeos, sporting events and family shows like the circus. On average, around 430,000 people attend events here every year.

Located in downtown Bismarck, our Arena is walking distance from shopping centers, restaurants, hotels, and a wide variety of local attractions. Itâ€™s central location is great for those seeking to enjoy a day outing or experience the local nightlife.

The arena was built in 1969 and will be celebrating its 50th Anniversary in 2019. Check back for more details on the upcoming celebration!
